WIndlord::

"But Aerotaur..." said the hawk using his comm link "I have in my 
arms a uncounced Maximal... and I can't leave him here and I think 
that he wouldn't like to wake up in a unknow base...  "

"Archangel Where're you???? " he said while he Flew and looked around 
trying to find him


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Come on Windlord.  It's time we leave here.  The enemy has 
scattered 
> it's time we go make some repairs of our own."  He transformed into 
his roc 
> form and flew off toward their own base.
